name: Firewood
description: An ordinary piece of wood. It makes you feel all fired up and warm on the inside. If you gather enough you could maybe make a campfire!

name: Stonesword
description: This is a beautifully crafted stone sword. Its not the brittle kind of stone its the sturdy type!

name: BananaRang
description: It's a banan'a, it's a bomeran'g, it's a Banan'rang! Although they dont come back when you throw them...

name: Farmors Dunderhonung
description: You dont know how she did it but farmor added dunder to the honung

name: ChugJug
description: Somehow this item travelled here from another world. It takes an entire 15 seconds to fully consume.

name: Apple
description: Don't know how this apple got into this dungeon, whatever. It works as a Doctor repellent, わーい!
